name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pontem Crypto Wallet - Eth, Sol, BTC +

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web3 | DeFi | NFTs | Aptos, Ethereum, Bitcoin, & Solana

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple, powerful crypto wallet for Ethereum, Solana, Bitcoin, Aptos and more. Pontem Wallet  has all the functionality you need for DeFi, Web3, and NFTs with ultra-low fees. Plus, it’s triple-audited for peerless security.

Brought to you by Pontem Network, the leading Aptos product development studio.  

Send, store, & swap tokens
Transact across Bitcoin, Ethereum, Aptos & Solana with low fees and fast speeds.

Triple-audited
Your tokens are safe with Pontem Wallet. Fully audited by Zellic, OtterSec, and Halborn.

NFT Viewer
Explore your collection and connect to major NFT platforms on Bitcoin, Ethereum, Aptos, and Solana.

Fast and affordable
Transactions on Aptos cost just .001 APT, with sub-second confirmation and 160,000 TPS throughput. 

Native swapping and staking

With Pontem’s Liquidswap DEX built in, you can swap and stake tokens without leaving the wallet. 

About Pontem
Pontem Network is a blockchain studio building for Aptos and the Move ecosystem. 
Our other products include: 
- Liquidswap – The first DEX on Aptos
- Lumio – A multichain Optimistic L2
